ValidationRule.description: Ensure that the event is not linked to a parent campaign.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND(
OR( Event_Conference_Name__r.RecordType.Name = 'CorporatePay', Event_Conference_Name__r.RecordType.Name = 'CorporatePay Marketing Events Master', Event_Conference_Name__r.RecordType.Name = 'CorporatePay Parent'),
NOT(TEXT(Event_Conference_Name__r.Type) = 'Parent'), NOT(TEXT(Event_Conference_Name__r.Type) = 'Trade Show')
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please search for the parent campaign (it's name is the name of the event or partner only)
